page.title: 16GAMES
page.content: {Sticky toffee}is a simple game and you need at least seven children to play but it is better with more. One or two people are the catchers and their job is to catch everybody.Once you have been caught you must stand in one place with your legs wide open until someone goes between your legs to let you play the game again.The game ends when everyone is standing with their legs open.I like it because it is a very fast game. {40,40}Before you start you have to decide what is going to be the base.First of all decide who is going to be the seeker.He counts to fourty while the rest of the people hide and he has to find them.Once spotted he runs back to base and says 40,40 I see "name".If the person can out run the seeker and touch the base and say 40,40 he is in.Great fun.
